title: Israel’s Military to Remove Two Officers Over Death of Elderly Palestinian-American
sub_head: IDF, following U.S.-supported investigation, says death was result of moral failure by soldiers
body:
Israel’s military said two of its officers will be removed from their posts over the death last month of an elderly Palestinian-American man who suffered a heart attack after he was bound, gagged and eventually abandoned in a courtyard.
The death of Omar Abdelmajid As’ad, 78 years old, in the early hours of Jan. 12 sparked an uproar in Israel and the occupied West Bank. The U.S. State Department requested clarification over the incident, saying it supported an Israel Defense Forces investigation.
